abstract: Bank officials said that the special committee was still working on a punishment recommendation.
snippet: Bank officials said that the special committee was still working on a punishment recommendation.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 7 — A committee of World Bank directors has formally notified Paul D. Wolfowitz that they found him to be guilty of a conflict of interest in arranging for a pay raise and promotion for Shaha Ali Riza, his companion, in 2005. The findings stepped up the pressure on Mr. Wolfowitz to resign.

headline.main: World Bank Panel Finds Wolfowitz at Fault; Aide Resigns
